ygData.subject: OOC: Slowing down
ygData.msgSnippet: Just a note. I will be slowing things down a bit for a while. Adam has told me that he is facing RL issues with school and other things and we are all aware

Subject: OOC: Slowing down

Just a note.

I will be slowing things down a bit for a while. Adam has told me that
he is facing RL issues with school and other things and we are all
aware that Airly is facing computer issues.

No problems on those accounts, I know we all have RL stuff that will
come in on us from time to time :)

However in an effort to give everyone time to get back on their feet I
will just be focusing on the thread 'Frigid Callings' which for the
most part involves Sandy's characters.

You see the problem is that Tuscon has kind of shot ahead of the rest
of the pack, and this is all suppose to be a coming together of
things.

Again no pressure from me on anyone. :)

I will just be patient and let folks take a breather and come back
when they are ready. I don't want to force anyone to struggle and post
when there are other destractions in their lives.

Just poke me when you are ready, and I will unpause the other threads
and we can go on. (I will probrably speed the other threads up to
match Tuscon's position)

I hope everyone is enjoying themselves (In the game at in Real Life)
and I look foward to seeing everyone back in the posting spirit in the
days ahead! :)

- Preston
